##AngularUI

```
bower install angularUI

```


###usage

#### Directives

##### draggable
```
<div 
    ui-draggable
    on-drag-start="fn"
    on-drag-move="fn"
    on-drag-stop="fn"
    containment="parent"></div>

```

##### resizable
```
<div 
    ui-resizable
    on-resize-start="fn"
    on-resize-move="fn"
    on-resize-stop="fn"
    containment="parent"
    fixedRatio="false"></div>
```
